title: [Large-scale] Elementary Language Teaching Competency Enhancement Course Using Technological Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using basic digital tools (PowerPoint, word processors)
context.additional_context: As working professionals, the goal is to engage in learning outside of work hours and acquire practical technical skills for applying language education in real-world settings.

learning_goals: The principles of educational application of technology tools can be explained, and three or more tools suitable for elementary language classes can be selected.
Language learning activity materials can be designed using digital content creation tools (Canva, Google Slides, etc.).
Lesson scenarios applying collaborative tools like Quizlet and Padlet can be created for learner-engaged class design in BYOD environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
